title: Tom Cruise
summary: Thomas Cruise Mapother IV (born 3 July  1962) is an American actor and producer. One of the world's highest-paid actors,[1] he has received various accolades throughout his career, including three Golden Globe Awards, in addition to nominations for a British Academy Film Award and three Academy Awards. His films have grossed over $4 billion in North America and over $10.1 billion worldwide,[2] making him one of the highest-grossing box office stars of all time.[3]
